name: TypeOfGroup
description: To label a group of targets.

name: Species
description: To set the species of an animal.

name: Sex
description: To set the sex of an animal.

name: Location
description: To set the location of a target.

name: Weight
description: To set the weight of a target.

name: ParentgroupFather
description: To link a parent-group to an animal that may be a father.

name: ParentgroupMother
description: To link a parent-group to an animal that may be a mother.

name: Certain
description: To indicate whether the parenthood of an animal regarding a parent-group is certain.

name: Father
description: To link an animal to its father.

name: Mother
description: To link an animal to its mother.

name: Group
description: To add a target to a panel.

name: Parentgroup
description: To link a litter to a parent-group.

name: DateOfBirth
description: To set a target's or a litter's date of birth.

name: Size
description: To set the size of a target-group, for instance a litter.

name: WeanSize
description: To set the wean size of a litter.

name: WeanSizeFemale
description: To set the number of females in a litter when weaning.

name: WeanSizeMale
description: To set the number of males in a litter when weaning.

name: WeanSizeUnknown
description: To set the number of animals of unknown sex in a litter when weaning.

name: Street
description: To set the street part of an address.

name: Housenumber
description: To set the house-number part of an address.

name: City
description: To set the city part of an address.

name: CustomID
description: To set a target's custom ID.

name: WeanDate
description: To set a litter's or target's date of weaning.

name: GenotypeDate
description: To set a litter's date of genotyping.

name: CageCleanDate
description: To set a target's date of cage cleaning.

name: DeathDate
description: To set a target's date of death.

name: Active
description: To register a target's activity span.

name: Background
description: To set an animal's genotypic background.

name: Source
description: To link an animal or a breeding line to a source.

name: Line
description: To link a parentgroup to a breeding line.

name: LineInfoLink
description: To provide a link to a website with information about this line.

name: LineJAXName
description: To provide the full line name according to JAX mouse nomenclature

name: LineFullName
description: To provide the full line name according to some internal nomenclature

name: SourceType
description: To set the type of an animal source (used in VWA Report 4).

name: SourceTypeSubproject
description: To set the animal's source type, when it enters a DEC subproject (used in VWA Report 5).

name: ParticipantGroup
description: To set the participant group an animal is considered part of.

name: OldAnimalDBRemarks
description: To store remarks about the animal in the animal table, from the old version of AnimalDB.

name: Remark
description: To store remarks about the animal.

name: Litter
description: To link an animal to a litter.

name: ExperimentNr
description: To set a (sub)experiment's number.

name: ExperimentTitle
description: To set a (sub)experiment's title.

name: DecSubprojectApplicationPdf
description: To set a link to a PDF file with the (sub)experiment's DEC application.

name: DecApplicationPdf
description: To set a link to a PDF file with the DEC application.

name: DecApprovalPdf
description: To set a link to a PDF file with the DEC approval.

name: DecApplication
description: To link a DEC subproject (experiment) to a DEC application.

name: DecNr
description: To set a DEC application's DEC number.

name: DecTitle
description: To set the title of a DEC project.

name: DecApplicantId
description: To link a DEC application to a user with this ID in the old version of AnimalDB.

name: DecBudget
description: To set the maximum amount of animals that can be used in a main DEC project.

name: DecSubprojectBudget
description: To set the maximum amount of animals that can be used in a DEC subproject.

name: Anaesthesia
description: To set the Anaesthesia value of (an animal in) an experiment.

name: PainManagement
description: To set the PainManagement value of (an animal in) an experiment.

name: AnimalEndStatus
description: To set the AnimalEndStatus value of an experiment.

name: LawDef
description: To set the Lawdef value of an experiment.

name: ToxRes
description: To set the ToxRes value of an experiment.

name: SpecialTechn
description: To set the SpecialTechn value of an experiment.

name: Goal
description: To set the Goal of an experiment.

name: Concern
description: To set the Concern value of an experiment.

name: FieldBiology
description: To indicate whether a DEC application is related to field biology.

name: ExpectedDiscomfort
description: To set the expected discomfort of an animal in an experiment.

name: ActualDiscomfort
description: To set the actual discomfort of an animal in an experiment.

name: AnimalType
description: To set the animal type.

name: ExpectedAnimalEndStatus
description: To set the expected end status of an animal in an experiment.

name: ActualAnimalEndStatus
description: To set the actual end status of an animal in an experiment.

name: Experiment
description: To link an animal to a DEC subproject (experiment).

name: FromExperiment
description: To remove an animal from a DEC subproject (experiment).

name: GeneModification
description: A genetic modification to a gene in an animal.

name: GeneState
description: To indicate whether an animal is homo- or heterozygous for a gene modification.

name: VWASpecies
description: To give a species the name the VWA uses for it.

name: LatinSpecies
description: To give a species its scientific (Latin) name.

name: DutchSpecies
description: To give a species its Dutch name.

name: StartDate
description: To set a (sub)project's start date.

name: EndDate
description: To set a (sub)project's end date.

name: Removal
description: To register an animal's removal.

name: Article
description: To set an actor's Article status according to the Law, e.g. Article 9.

name: MolgenisUserId
description: To set an actor's corresponding MolgenisUser ID.

name: TransponderId
description: To set the ID of an animal's transponder.

name: Color
description: To set an animal's color.

name: Earmark
description: To set an animal's earmark.

name: ResponsibleResearcher
description: To set the researcher responsible for this animal.
